item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Brandy 15 ml Triple sec 15 ml Lemon juice 10 ml Maraschino liqueur 4 dashes Aromatic Bitters sugar lemon twist Instructions Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients (Maraschino optional). Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Manhattan
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rye whisky or Bourbon 20 ml Sweet vermouth 4 dashes Aromatic Bitters cherry Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

item.title: Martinez
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Gin 45 ml Sweet vermouth 5 ml Maraschino liqueur 4 dashes Aromatic Bitters lemon twist Instructions Stirred over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Martini
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Gin 20 ml Dry vermouth 4 dashes Orange Bitters lemon twist olives Instructions Stir ingredients (orange bitters are optional). Make sure the drink and glass are cold. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

item.title: Old fashioned
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rye whisky or Bourbon 5 ml Sugar syrup 4 dashes Aromatic Bitters orange or lemon twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a twist.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Pisco 30 ml Lime juice 15 ml Sugar syrup 1/2 Egg white Aromatic Bitters lime slice Instructions Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.

item.title: Sazerac
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rye whisky 5 ml Sugar syrup 4 dashes Peychaud’s Bitters 4 dashes Absinthe lemon twist Instructions (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe. Stirred. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

item.title: Scofflaw
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml Rye whisky 25 ml Dry vermouth 10 ml Grenadine 4 dashes Orange Bitters 15 ml Lemon juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Bourbon 30 ml Lemon juice 15 ml Sugar syrup 4 dashes Orange Bitters 1/2 Egg white (optional) cherry orange twist Instructions Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice and double strain. Serve in a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with orange twist and cherry.
